name: Waxination
description:
This is a game about Icarus and some birds...

...and some clouds, waves, the sea and the sun, all of which you have to avoid!

Fly as long as you can before the sun melts your wings (or they break in another way), collecting feathers that fall from birds, and wax from candles carried by waves.

Upgrade your wings from the collected materials, to reach longer (or higher...?) in this everlasting journey!
